name: Checkers VR (Suplife Games)
description:
Join to win the FREE GAME :D 👉 Discord

Welcome to Westworld! What say you to a "civilised duel" where you are the guest? Imagine yourself in a pleated shirt and a notched collar-styled waistcoat covered by a suit made of brushed fabric, a fedora sitting on your head. You may walk into a tavern and order an old pot, preparing for a match with your old friend in the free and wild west. Besides that, could I tempt you with an exotic rendezvous with our AI hosts? But can you tell if she's real? Or does it matter at all? My advice? Ride on!

Features

🥇 Multiple AI difficulty levels available

🏰 Dueling cowboys in the Wild West

💡 Detailed & beginner-friendly instructions

📜 Retro UI design & good interactions

↩ Undo function

✌️ Excellent experience with controllers

In addition to traditional checkers experience, we will provide rich VR features, including: Online mode, better interactive experience, various scenes for Checkers, real-time voice chat, Checkers with friends, AI hosts with different characters.
